name: EWS
customPrimary:
%s: When the target is stays hit by the beam for %s, its chances to suffer malfunctions will increase.

Effect will be removed after a short period of time. Hits to the hull refresh the decay timer.

Hits to the shield do not count to either the apply or decay timer.

name: SRSMB
customPrimary: %s: Within %s of a hostile target, the warhead discards the engine and casing, launching a sabot shot towards the target. Sabot shots have a %s chance of failing, instead shattering and dealing a maximum of %s points of %s damage.

name: SRASMB
customPrimary: %s: High Explosive Anti-Vessel warheads, based on the ancient HEAT munition concept. Within %s of a target the SRMs launch their warheads, however there is a %s chance the shells fail to sufficiently penetrate the armor belt, changing the damage type to %s and only dealing at maximum %s points of damage.
